Leaves: Folded up to 15 cm long blades.
Flowers: Windmill-like spread of 5-10 spikes radiating from single point on end of stem.
FruitSeeds: Green to purple to black flat-topped florets in spikelets with awns to 15 mm long.
DistinguishingFeatures: Distinguished from other-windmill like grasses by awns and flat-topped florets.
Impacts: Becomes unpalatable with age, outcompetes native grasses.

Photos.Caption: Flower spikes break off and roll away
